com.foreach.across.core.annotations.Refreshable

  • Packages that use Refreshable 
    Package Description
    com.foreach.across.core.registry  

    • Uses of Refreshable in com.foreach.across.core.registry

      Classes in com.foreach.across.core.registry with annotations of type Refreshable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IncrementalRefreshableRegistry<T>
      Extends the RefreshableRegistry by scanning for members every time a module has bootstrapped.
      class  RefreshableRegistry<T>
      The RefreshableRegistry is a simple bean holding a collection of instances and provides more flexibility than autowiring a list of instances directly.
